solution_line_template: If seven more rabbits are added to the thirteen in the cage, the total number becomes {rabbits_added}+{rabbits_in_cage} = <<{rabbits_added}+{rabbits_in_cage}={total_rabbits_cage}>>{total_rabbits_cage}

Triple the number of rabbits in the cage is {triple}*{total_rabbits_cage} = <<{triple}*{total_rabbits_cage}={rabbits_in_park}>>{rabbits_in_park}, the same as the number of rabbits that Jasper saw at the park today.
